今次係IELTS WRITING 唔該巴打幫手睇睇

It is generally believed that the Internet is an excellent means of communication but some people suggest that it may not be the best place to find information.Discuss both these views and give your own opinion.

Though access to the internet, everyone can share their knowledge and information with strangers around the world. Some thus reckon that, with diversified sources of information and abundant knowledge, the Internet is the best place to communicate and learn. However, others argue that considering limitations to verity all information available, it is not the best place as the correctness of the information is in doubt. I believe that if we carefully make use of the Internet, it would serve as a good tool to learn.

With an increasingly advanced technology, the Internet is able to connect the whole world together. Although we may not see each other before, we can communicate and share what we know through the internet with the use of websites, emails and other communication tools. A striking example is Wikipedia, a website where everyone can compile and edit information of a certain word or event. With the help of the website, people can freely communicate and share their specific knowledge and also learn unknown knowledge which is difficult to acquire in reality. Given the merits, some thus believe Internet is an excellent means of communication.

However, the Internet is also rife with fake information, rumours and false facts. Given the ease of access, it is tempted for someone to spread rumours in favor of their own interests. For instance, some nasty investor would spread rumours against a company so that they can take advantages in the stock markets. Even in the previous example of Wikipedia, there are a lot of untrue facts as moderators take time to verify a mass of information. Despite that, I still believe we can make good use of the Internet as long as we are cautious about the information found. For example, we can cross-check the news with several websites to ensure its correctness, and we can go to verified and trustworthy websites only.

In sum, the internet has a plenty of resources which can be made use of. But we have to be cautious all the time so that we will not be misled.
